Race.SpecificTitle: Village of Mer Rouge -- 3.66 Mills - Mayor & BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Village of Mer Rouge Proposition
(Millage Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 3.66 mills tax continuation for the purpose of maintaining, improving and repairing the streets and public thoroughfares within the Village of Mer Rouge.
Race.FullText: Shall the Village of Mer Rouge, State of Louisiana (the "Village"), continue to levy and collect a special tax of three and sixty-six hundredths (3.66) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Village (an estimated $18,700 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of maintaining, improving and repairing the streets and public thoroughfares within the corporate limits of the Village?
